Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in determining the applicants were not Convention refugees or persons in need of protection

Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Availability of state protection and internal flight alternative
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to prove lack of state protection or internal relocation impossibility

Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Standard of proof and availability of remedies in home country
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of objective basis for fear of persecution
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence to rebut state protection presumption
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimants challenged Board's assessment of state protection
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Burden and standard of proof in refugee claims

Crimes.Protection_Claim: State unable or unwilling to protect
Crimes.Enforcement_Action: No formal complaint filed with police

Crimes.Legal_Basis: Refugee Convention grounds (membership in particular social group)

Crimes.Governing_Law: Canadian immigration law and refugee determination rules

Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Failed to follow up or provide verifiable evidence

Crimes.Cause_Description: Extortion by gang and harassment by municipal worker
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Board entitled to assess credibility and weight

Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Insufficient to overcome presumption of state protection
